Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-8058 affecting package glibc for versions less than 2.38-15
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-8058 affecting package glibc for versions less than 2.38-15. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package glibc is earlier than 2.38-15, affected by CVE-2025-8058
